Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: Moved to the correct component, was in the fabric node-sdk component.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: A fix has gone in to ensure that if neither has been called then it will call shim.error. This was actually in but due to cyclic requires it may not work as expected. However this is there only to ensure that chaincode always calls either shim.success or shim.error

Action.author: sashapesic
Action.body: node SDK, in putState. Any fresh ideas on how to address the issue? I am calling shim.success. >
